flawed_nl_solution:
He has already done 264 this week because 34 + 20 + 123 + 64 + 23 = <<34+20+123+64+23=264>>264.
If he does 62 he will have done as many as last week because 324 - 264 = <<324-264=62>>62
He has to do 63 on Saturday because 62 + 1 = <<62+1=63>>63
#### 63

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 60, not 62. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
